info.name: MIRADOR-CORE API
info.description: Mirador Core is a comprehensive observability and analytics platform that provides KPI definitions, metrics, logs, traces, and correlation analysis for monitoring and analyzing system metrics. Authentication and authorization are handled externally.

query.name: RBAC (REMOVED)
query.description: RBAC and role-based endpoints were removed from Mirador Core in v9.0.0. Authentication and authorization are now handled externally by API gateways, identity providers, or service mesh. These examples are kept for historical reference only.

url.name: Api Keys (REMOVED)
url.description: API key endpoints were removed from Mirador Core in v9.0.0. API keys should be managed externally by your identity provider or API gateway. These examples are kept for historical reference only.

query.description: Tenant ID (optional, defaults to request context)
